thread.title: Newswire: Chris Brown backs out of Soulja Boy boxing match
thread.title_full: Newswire: Chris Brown backs out of Soulja Boy boxing match

author: Danette Chavez
title: Newswire: Chris Brown backs out of Soulja Boy boxing match
text:
Share Tweet 
The Chris Brown-Soulja Boy feud won’t get the neat, pay-per-view resolution the two rappers were promoting last month, Fact Magazine reports . Their beef reportedly began after Soulja Boy showed a little social media appreciation for one of Brown’s exes, which was apparently beyond the pale for Brown. Their war of words eventually escalated to lawsuit threats and promises of a physical fight that would once and for all resolve Soulja’s alleged lack of deference shown to all people Brown has ever been in contact with. But according to Soulja Boy, Brown won’t sign the contract for the boxing match that had been deemed the only way to settle their dispute (and maybe make a little money along the way). Chris brown manager call my manager last night sand said the fight is off and he’s not signing contract. Don’t ask me about the shit no more — Soulja Boy (@souljaboy) February 20, 2017 
Despite Soulja Boy’s preemptive refusal to answer further questions on the matter, he did indulge fans who asked what was going on with their fight, telling them that Brown was effectively backing out. This is probably going to be a bummer for Floyd Mayweather, who trained Soulja, and 50 Cent, who set up the fight.
